1.  [**randconfig+**](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.14339883): A sampler for Kconfig-based systems, including, the Linux Kernel, axtls, barebox-x86, buildroot, busybox, coreboot, embtoolkit, etaos-avr, fiasco, freetz, halm, klipper, mplayer, openbios-x86, rnk-arm, seabios, swupdate, toybox, u-boot, uClibc-ng, and xelix.
